item.title: About
item.description: I am Leow Kah Man, a Software Architect and Full Stack Software Developer, lives in Malaysia, likes just about anything that has to do with technology. I am extremely passionate about designing cloud architectures that drive new innovations, raise scalability and reduce time to deploy. During my spare time, I like tinkering with OpenWRT and Raspberry Pi, and trying out new cloud services. This blog was built using Hugo with CI deployment using GitLab.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please comment on posts if you have questions regarding a specific post. For general matters, you may contact me preferably by sending a private message via Facebook. Otherwise you could also drop me a message via contact form.
